title: Battle for Freljord In Game Quest Disabled?
body:
So with my recent match, I was allied to Lissandra, and the enemy team had Ashe. For some reason, when both of them got the total or exceeded 20 kills/assists, the event never triggered. 

I believe Lissandra first exceeded, then the enemy Ashe kinda died in a teamfight and got some assists from the fight which got her to 20 or more.

I was hoping that in her resurrection, the event would finally trigger, but it didn't happen at all.

Is the event bugged or something? or it's because of that situation?

replies.body:
Hey! 

You're right that they needed 20+ kills and assists! Was Lissandra or Ashe at least level 16? The event won't trigger prior to that.

I didn't know that was a thing, but I believe our Ashe was lower than level 16 when she got to at least 20 from both kills and assists. That might've been the reason why it didn't trigger. But then after that we had more teamfights, and it still didn't trigger (I don't exactly remember)

Maybe the game ended before the event could even trigger.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2252817357/47213537?tab=overview

This was the game.

Hmm. It's hard to tell from the match history itself what may have happened in this case. Both champions were 18 by the game's end, and had 20+ kills and assists. I was able to trigger it when testing internally. Did the quest bar pop up, or did nothing happen at all? Was there any special VO playing?

Perchance quests/events are disabled in Ranked or nah?
Just a shot in the dark; trying to assist.
Ah! You're right, it was a ranked game. I believe they're turned off in competitive, as to not sway gameplay.

Ayyy <3  Glad the mystery is solved.  
I remember the first time I saw that quest in game, it was so exciting and fun.^^
The crown is so cute! ^-^ There's also a quest with Kha'Zix and Rengar! :o
Mhm.^^  Imho Kha gets the better end of that stick if he wins.

Would love to see more 'quests' in the future ie GP/MF TF/Graves NASUS/RENEKTON etc. 

Who should I pester about this? Can you give me cactopus's phone / fax number? I'll spamm him about adding more ^^
What's the event? it sounds really cool.

ty
***WHERE'S SOLOQ! WHERE'S URGOT'S REWORK! WHERE'S YASUO NERFS***
sorry i could not resist.
That's a pretty cool event though. GJ to those who worked on it.
